alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Merrimack; Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 3:19PM EDT until September 08 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rockingham County in southern New Hampshire... Southern Strafford County in central New Hampshire... Southeastern Hillsborough County in southern New Hampshire... Southeastern Merrimack County in central New Hampshire... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 319 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Amherst to near Litchfield to near Salem, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manchester, Derry, Merrimack, Salem, Bedford, Milford, Hooksett, Amherst, Litchfield, Epping, Raymond, Goffstown, Hudson, Londonderry, Hampstead, Atkinson, Auburn, Chester, Danville, and Allenstown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 93 between mile markers 4 and 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
